Package model.strategies

Interface Summary
IStrategy An interface used for strategies.
 

Class Summary
RandomStrategy A simple strategy that choses a random, valid direction.
StrategyFactory A factory that can get a particular strategy instance.
WallHuggerStrategy A strategy that attempts to move onto a position that is adjacent to a wall.
WallHuggerStrategyTest The test class WallHuggerStrategyTest.
 

Enum Summary
StrategyFactory.Type Enum representing the various types of strategies.
